heading: Sunday
text: Sunshine, mixing with afternoon clouds from the west. Highs in the 20s to near 30 north, in the mid 30s south. Light and variable wind.

heading: Sunday Night
text: Mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a stray snow shower moving in from the west. Lows from near 10 into the teens, nearing 20 along Lake Champlain and in the warmer valleys.

heading: Monday (Presidents’ Day)
text: Mostly cloudy, with some sunshine developing in the valleys. Much more mild with highs in the 30s to near 40.
